uvi.product_version: versions from v2.6.28 to before v5.10.73
uvi.description:
phy: mdio: fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.73 by commit 0d2dd40a7be61b89a7c99dae8ee96389d27b413a, it was introduced in version v2.6.28 by commit 46abc02175b3c246dd5141d878f565a8725060c9. For more details please see the references link.
